content: Absolutely. Supporting journalists and upholding the values of free and independent journalism is crucial in promoting transparency, accountability, and democratic values. We must do everything we can to protect and support journalists who are carrying out risky and important work, and to hold those who threaten or attack the press accountable. By doing so, we can help to ensure that the public has access to accurate and independent information, and that democracy and human rights are protected and strengthened around the world.
